content: In our Emerging Market segment, our Quantum subsidiary, generated very little revenue in the first quarter compared to last year's contribution related to our U.S. Border Patrol efforts. Our industrial product revenue for the first quarter was $8.2 million, an increase of 14% compared to last year's revenue of $6.9 million. Imaging products revenue for the three months ending December 31, 2021 was $3.2 million, an increase of 27% compared -- when compared to $2.5 million from the same period last year. Revenue from our emerging market segments for the first quarter of fiscal year 2022 is a $137,000 compared to $8.8 million from the same period of the prior fiscal year.
